subject: Amendment to the procedure and delegation of power for relief to Contractors / developers of Road Sector under Atmanirbhar Bharat.
text: HRaf <4y <TMIf gifaasrut TY /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7335 4aa7 8r TTHF H1) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vfl-5 & 6, 74er-10, E1aT, 7f fadtt _ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Atmanirbhar Bharat Policy No. 18.47/2020 dated 30/06/2020 [Decision taken on manual file No.NHAV/13013/547/c0/20-21] Procedure and Delegation of Power for Relief to Contractors Developers Sub: Amendment to the of Road Sector under Atmanirbhar Bharat: No.18.46/2020 dated June, 2020 issued procedure and delegation of NHAI vide Policy guidelines circulated by NHAI vide OM No NHA COVID power for effective implementation of thel Atmanirbhar Bharat: Relief for 19/RoadMap/cMD/2O2O(CN5788) dated 08" June, 2020 on thee subject The procedure and delegation of power in respect of S.No (viii) Contractors/Developers of Road Sector: of 1of the Guidelines dt. 22" June, 2020 has been amended as under: para Procedure Delegation of Powers S.No. Relief (3) (4) (1) (2) Tolling Project Director to Regional Officer (viii) For all National Highway Contracts, loss in collection of process the case fee may be compensated in accordance with the Contract 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (Amarendra Kumar) Chief General Manager(Coord:) To: All Officers of HQ/ROs/PIU/CMUs Site Offices Copy to AlI Members/cvO . PS to Chairman (iii) Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi (iv) Library for hosting the circular on library site (v) Web Admin for circulation: MT {UM NHAL 22nd
